transcript: Hi, this is Carlos Reyes. I'm calling because I stopped taking metformin because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Stopped taking metformin due to side effects
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Please speak with us again after consulting with your prescriber or pharmacist to discuss your treatment plan. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: [REDACTED_NAME] reports experiencing dizziness after taking metformin.
